metadata.title: CVE-2023-6209

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 SP4

metadata.description: Relative URLs starting with three slashes were incorrectly parsed, and a path-traversal "/../" part in the path could be used to override the specified host. This could contribute to security problems in web sites. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 120, Firefox ESR < 115.5.0, and Thunderbird < 115.5.
